sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, FormArray } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { otherDataForm: FormGroup; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.otherDataForm = this.formBuilder.group({ horizontalLineCount: null, verticalLineCount: null, horizontalDistances: this.formBuilder.array([]), verticalDistances: this.formBuilder.array([]) }); } ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit(): void { // Access the values of line counts for horizontal and vertical lines const horizontalLineCount = this.otherDataForm.value.horizontalLineCount; const verticalLineCount = this.otherDataForm.value.verticalLineCount; // Access the form arrays for distances const horizontalDistances = this.otherDataForm.get('horizontalDistances') as FormArray; const verticalDistances = this.otherDataForm.get('verticalDistances') as FormArray; // Log the line counts console.log('Horizontal Line Count:', horizontalLineCount); console.log('Vertical Line Count:', verticalLineCount); // Log the distances for horizontal lines for (let i = 0; i < horizontalLineCount; i++) { const distance = horizontalDistances.controls[i].value; console.log(`Horizontal Distance ${i + 1}:`, distance); } // Log the distances for vertical lines for (let i = 0; i < verticalLineCount; i++) { const distance = verticalDistances.controls[i].value; console.log(`Vertical Distance ${i + 1}:`, distance); } // Clear the form after submission (optional) this.otherDataForm.reset(); } getLinesArray(lineCount: number): number[] { return Array(lineCount).fill(0).map((_, index) => index + 1); } addHorizontalDistance(): void { const horizontalDistances = this.otherDataForm.get('horizontalDistances') as FormArray; horizontalDistances.push(this.formBuilder.control(null)); } addVerticalDistance(): void { const verticalDistances = this.otherDataForm.get('verticalDistances') as FormArray; verticalDistances.push(this.formBuilder.control(null)); } }
